Company Overview.Name: Maan Aluminium Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Manufacturing & trading of aluminium profiles, anodizing and fabrication of profiles, aluminium ingots, aluminium billets etc. MAL manufactures and exports Aluminum extruded products. It has in-house anodising and fabrication facilities to manufacture value-added products. Company is an exclusive distributor of Hindalco for trading of aluminium billet/ingot and wire rod in North India and South India (ex-Hydrabad). Company purchases ingots and billets from large domestic suppliers like Vedanta Aluminium Limited, National Aluminium Company and Hindalco Industries Limited. In addition to domestic purchases, the company imports a part of its raw material requirement.
Company Overview.Market Position: Exclusive distributor of Hindalco for trading of aluminium billet/ingot and wire rod in North India and South India (ex-Hydrabad).
